alert.note: Alert for Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Salt Lake Valley; Tooele and Rush Valleys; Utah Valley (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 17 at 4:59PM MST until January 17 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches with locally higher amounts, especially across the Tooele Bench and Salt Lake Valley benches. * WHERE...Tooele and Rush Valleys, Salt Lake Valley, Utah Valley and Eastern Juab/Millard Counties. Roads may quickly become slushy and snow covered for this evening`s commute, especially in bench areas. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions, especially in the Tooele Valley and across benches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.
